Text.val: 21.07.2011 SH SCR16534 Activated module to change DBHS_KEY for invoices

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DBHS_TAB_PREFIX from :1/DBHS group by DBHS_TAB_PREFIX order by DBHS_TAB_PREFIX for fetch only

Text.val: -- Transaction level is on DBHS_TAB_PREFIX level
-- Updates where DBHS_KEY contains the administration as first 4 characters

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/DBHS A set A.DBHS_KEY = (select substr(digits(DBME_ID_NEW),6,4) from :1/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX and substr(digits(DBME_ID_OLD),6,4) = left(A.DBHS_KEY,4)) || substr(A.DBHS_KEY,5,length(A.DBHS_KEY)) where A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/DBME C where C.DBME_TAB_PREFIX = A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX and substr(digits(C.DBME_ID_OLD),6,4) = left(A.DBHS_KEY,4))

update :1/DBHS A set A.DBHS_KEY = (select int(DBME_ID_NEW) from :1/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX and int(DBME_ID_OLD) = trim(A.DBHS_KEY)) where A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/DBME C where C.DBME_TAB_PREFIX = A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX and int(C.DBME_ID_OLD) = trim(A.DBHS_KEY))

update :1/DBHS A set A.DBHS_KEY = left(A.DBHS_KEY,3) || (select digits(DBME_ID_NEW) from :1/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'DEBH' and digits(DBME_ID_OLD) = substr(A.DBHS_KEY,4,9)) || substr(A.DBHS_KEY,13,18) where A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/DBME C where C.DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'DEBH' and digits(C.DBME_ID_OLD) = substr(A.DBHS_KEY,4,9))

update :1/DBHS A set A.DBHS_KEY = left(A.DBHS_KEY,12) || (select digits(DBME_ID_NEW) from :1/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'DEBC' and digits(DBME_ID_OLD) = substr(A.DBHS_KEY,13,9)) || substr(A.DBHS_KEY,22,9) where A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX = ':2' and substr(A.DBHS_KEY,13,9) <> '000000000' and exists (select * from :1/DBME C where C.DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'DEBC' and digits(C.DBME_ID_OLD) = substr(A.DBHS_KEY,13,9))

Text.val: -- Extract DEBC_NO and DEBH_NO from DBHS_KEY (extracted from right to left
because of non fixed positions if read from left to right)
--> DEBC_NO in stored in DEBH_KEY with function trim(str(xxx,'9'))
--> DEBH_NO in stored in DEBH_KEY with function str(xxx,'9Z'), leading zeroes

SQL_STMT_U.val: update :1/DBHS A set A.DBHS_KEY = (select digits(DBME_ID_NEW) from :1/DBME where DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'INVO' and digits(DBME_ID_OLD) = trim(A.DBHS_KEY)) where A.DBHS_TAB_PREFIX = ':2' and exists (select * from :1/DBME C where C.DBME_TAB_PREFIX = 'INVO' and digits(C.DBME_ID_OLD) = trim(A.DBHS_KEY))
